title: UKC News: Lab Leak Hysteria Grows, DoD Vaccine Bioweapon, Kiev Regime Scared of Peace Talks
cleaned_text:
The “China Virus Lab Leak/Release” and Gain of Function hysteria continues to mount in the western media and political circles, as it becomes the new official conspiracy theory of the US government and the transatlantic deep state. But is it really true? We also breakdown the status of the US DoD’s bioweapons program and see how it was used to drive the vaccine roll out in Europe. Also, Ukrainians are now talking about the need for a peace settlement and an end to NATO’s proxy war, but the US-backed Junta in Kiev are not interested and are accusing Ukrainians of “dangerous thinking” when talking about a ceasefire. In the Republic of Georgia, a new ‘Maidan 1.0’ color revolutuon is brewing, which threatens to escalate to a full on regime change op, backed by the West. All this and more.

Hosts Mike Robinson and Patrick Henningsen with the end of week news round-up. Watch:

Tune into the UK’s premier alternative media news program with hosts Mike Robinson, Brian Gerrish, Patrick Henningsen, David Scott and Alex Thomson. Watch the UK Column News LIVE every Monday, Wednesday & Friday at 1pm UK time at www.ukcolumn.org/live or watch live on Rumble.

Also, watch all news programs later at their archive here.
